column4: BRIEF-Cryolife Expects Q1 2020 Revenue To Be About $65.5 Mln
column6: * AS OF MARCH 31, 2020 CRYOLIFE HAS OVER $60 MILLION IN CASH AND CASH EQUIVALENTS
column7: * EXPECTS Q1 2020 REVENUES TO BE APPROXIMATELY $65.5 MILLION COMPARED TO Q1 2020 REVENUE GUIDANCE OF $67 MILLION TO $69 MILLION
column8: * IS WITHDRAWING ITS PREVIOUSLY ANNOUNCED Q1 AND FULL YEAR 2020 FINANCIAL GUIDANCE WHICH WAS ISSUED ON FEBRUARY 13, 2020
column9: * CRYOLIFE - DELAYING CERTAIN RESEARCH AND DEVELOPMENT,CLINICAL RESEARCH PROJECTS THAT ARE NOT EXPECTED TO GENERATE REVENUE BEFORE 2023 BUT CONTINUING TO PURSUE THOSE THAT WILL
column10: * WHILE FULL SHORT TERM IMPACT ON US OF PANDEMIC IS NOT KNOWN
column11: * IS OPERATING ALL THREE OF ITS MANUFACTURING SITES AT NEAR FULL PRODUCTION
column12: * CRYOLIFE - ON MARCH 26,BORROWED ENTIRE AVAILABLE AMOUNT UNDER ITS $30 MILLION REVOLVING CREDIT FACILITY AS A PRECAUTIONARY MEASURE TO INCREASE CASH
column13: * HAS TAKEN PRE-EMPTIVE STEPS TO CURTAIL SPENDING Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
